title: Help Please
body: I wanted to download the new league client so i clicked the link in the top right of the league launcher. it said i joined the client update. nothing happend for a while so i tried to launch my game and it said i need to reinstall the league alpha client. if anybody had the same problem or knows how to fix it your help would be appreciated

replies.body: It sounds like the installation for the updated client didn't go properly and unable to load.  It may be necessary in this case to perform a [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  Once complete, you will have the option to upgrade back to the updated client.  Make sure to let it work without any interruptions!  Let me know if that clears things up!
